"Black Paper's Dangerous Deal":
"Even among the ARKS, you are the
strongest by far. I know it when I see it...
You can't hide anything from me.
I want a soul-burning battle...
But it's too soon... We haven't fought
together yet. I must know you better.
A quest with 100 vicious enemies...
Take me there.
※Clear on Normal or higher accompanied
only by Kireek"
